title: Deep Terror Thresh (bug)
body: Hello guys, has anyone noticed the bug on Deep Terror {{champion:412}} skin? When he casts his Q animation and the hook doesn't connect to a target than he stays in the "hooking" position for like 0.5 seconds

replies.body:
Hi hi! 

Thanks for the report! I compared this skin to the base, and they appear to be using the same animation. Would you happen to have a video of this?
